attributes.action: Law basis for future Press code
attributes.additional_details:
Government must establish a law to ensure the observance of any future agreed Press Code - so worded that it cannot be the beginning of a slippery slope to Government control of the Press.

This must be possible.  "Where there's a will there's a way. "

This should be done because it is THE WILL OF THE MAJORITY who want a system they can believe will work - and continue working.

We respect the Pm's right to hold a different opinion. But his fears, an individual's fears, should  not over-rule the will of the majority.

We totally share his desire  that this legal basis should not be the beginning of that slope that nobody in their right mind wants.
